The Little Devils have HEALTH Health, and DAMAGE% of the Warlock's _EFI_Fire¥ damage, and attack with fiery melee strikes. |Use:¥ Sacrifice a Soul to make the Little Devils cast _EFI_Fire _EFI_Nova¥.
